name: Aeon Co., Ltd.
description: Aeon Co., Ltd. is one of Japan's largest retail and distribution companies, established in 1758. The company operates a vast network of supermarkets, convenience stores, and shopping malls across Japan and other Asian countries, making it a key player in the retail industry. Aeon focuses on providing high-quality products and services to its customers, emphasizing fresh food, groceries, and a wide range of household goods. The company is committed to sustainability and has implemented various initiatives aimed at reducing its environmental impact, such as promoting eco-friendly products and reducing food waste. Aeon's business model not only includes retail but also extends to financial services, property management, and logistics, enhancing its market presence and overall business operations. Aeon has positioned itself as a community-oriented company, fostering local partnerships and engaging in various social responsibility programs. With a vision of creating a sustainable society through its business practices, Aeon aims to enhance the quality of life for its customers while contributing to the community and environment.

faq.question: What does Aeon primarily sell?
faq.answer: Aeon primarily sells groceries, fresh food, and household goods through its supermarkets and convenience stores.

faq.question: Where is Aeon headquartered?
faq.answer: Aeon is headquartered in Chiba, Japan.

faq.question: What initiatives does Aeon have for sustainability?
faq.answer: Aeon has various sustainability initiatives, including promoting eco-friendly products and reducing food waste.
